1.title: Tommy Thunder: Method Actor
1.plot: Sonic lets action movie star Tommy Thunder observe his hero process, but things erupt when Tommy claims credit for the gang's victories.

2.title: Spacemageddonocalypse
2.plot: Eggman discovers that an asteroid is on a collision course with the planet. It's up to Sonic and his friends to destroy it.

3.title: Nutwork
3.plot: Sticks is fed up that all the news is fluff, so she creates a podcast to speak truth to power. But things quickly spiral out of her control.

4.title: Alone Again, Unnaturally
4.plot: Sonic and Tails test an invention to make Sonic even faster, but Sonic goes so fast, that he eventually disappears. Did Tails disintegrate Sonic?

5.title: The Biggest Fan
5.plot: Sonic lets Mark the Tapir, a self-proclaimed number-one fan, become his personal assistant. Mark eventually goes too far.

6.title: Anything You Can Do, I Can Do Worser
6.plot: Eggman challenges Tails to prove he is a genius by capturing Sonic.

7.title: I Can Sea Sonic's Fear from Here
7.plot: Eggman concocts a plan in which Sonic fights him underwater. In order to defeat Eggman, Sonic must overcome his aqua-phobia.

8.title: In the Midnight Hour
8.plot: In the middle of the night, Sticks discovers a mysterious figure indoctrinating the village. The gang thinks she's just paranoid.

9.title: Multi-Tails
9.plot: Worried that he isn't smart enough, Tails creates a machine to duplicate himself and forms a brain trust with his replicas.

10.title: Strike
10.plot: Orbot and Cubot have had enough of Eggman. Down tools. They're going on strike.

11.title: The Evil Dr. Orbot
11.plot: When evil Dr. Eggman initially fails his evil license test, he uses Orbot as his last chance exam stand-in. Unfortunately, the newly authorized evil Dr. Orbot gets a bit out of control.

12.title: Knuck Knuck! Who's Here?
12.plot: How does one get a family when one is the last echidna? Knuckles searches for an answer and his findings are hilariously disturbing.

13.title: Mech Suits Me
13.plot: It's metallic madness as Sonic is possessed by an ancient mech suit.

14.title: FiendBot
14.plot: Team Sonic gains an unlikely new ally when Eggman's plans once again go awry. But is it friend or fiend...bot?

15.title: Og Man Out
15.plot: When Frogolodyte Og surfaces, trouble boils over and onto Team Sonic's island.

16.title: Knine-to-Five-Knuckles
16.plot: Two jobs plus one echidna equals Knine-to-Five Knuckles.

17.title: Blackout
17.plot: When a blackout strikes the town, Team Sonic sets out to a remote ancient ruin to find an all new energy source.

18.title: Unnamed Episode
18.plot: When people find out the village was once called "Badgerville" after Sticks' evil ancestor, anti-badger sentiment runs rampant. An election to rename the village leads to Eggman seizing power.

19.title: Robot Employees
19.plot: Dr. Eggman creates a new line of robot workers for Meh Burger, but there is more to these robot employees than meets the eye.

20.title: Give Bees a Chance
20.plot: Love knows no bounds when Team Sonic see to the care and feeding of Eggman's beebot.

21.title: Mombot
21.plot: Feeling the need for unconditional love, Eggman creates Mombot. Unfortunately, Mombot proves to be more of an embarrassment than the perfect mother.

22.title: Muckfoot
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: Nominatus Rising
23.plot: Eggman's old enemy, the computer virus, Nominatus, is able to reanimate himself into the real world. With the help of his two virus sidekicks, he tries, once again, to take over the planet.

24.title: Eggman's Brother
24.plot: Steve Eggman comes to town, claiming to be Eggman's long-lost brother. He wants to fight for good alongside Sonic and the gang.

25.title: Do Not Disturb
25.plot: An endangered species, the Widabit, wanders into Sonic's shack. Sonic he can't move the ugly, smelly animal because of a series of government regulations so he's forced to move in with Tails.

26.title: Robots from the Sky: Part 1
26.plot: When a spaceship containing robots from a city in the clouds lands near Hedgehog Village, it's occupants, Mighton and Bolts, think Sonic and the gang are villains because they destroy robots.

27.title: Robots from the Sky: Part 2
27.plot: Robots all over the planet have turned evil and are out of control. It seems they have all been infected by some sort of virus. Sonic and Tails travel to the city in the clouds to get help curing the infected robots.

28.title: Robots from the Sky: Part 3
28.plot: Sonic and Tails discover that the city in the clouds has been taken over by an evil robot that's controlling all the other robots. And the worst part is, that robot, Hypnobot, was originally created by Tails.

29.title: Robots from the Sky: Part 4
29.plot: The gang battles Hypnobot and Eggman's hypnotized robots, but there are just too many. Bolts creates cyborg duplicates of the gang to help them. The cyborgs aren't effected by Hypnobot because their programming is based on Team Sonic's DNA.

30.title: Flea-ing from Trouble
30.plot: The gang learns that sometimes the fiercest things come in the smallest packages when Eggman attacks with his tiniest robot yet.

31.title: Lightning Bowler Society
31.plot: The Lightning Bolts leave villainy and become bowlers. Their fame soars, threatening to steal Sonic and the gangs' fan base. Eggman decides to capitalize on the situation.

32.title: Planes, Trains and Dude-Mobiles
32.plot: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails are stoked when they find out their band Dudeitude has booked its first road gig on the far side of the island. In their new decked-out touring van, the guys hit the road.

33.title: Sticks and Amy's Excellent Staycation
33.plot: With the guys' band away for a gig, Amy and Sticks decide to have a girls' weekend. When Belinda hears half the gang is gone, she feels it's the perfect time to attack.

34.title: Inn Sanity
34.plot: Eggman can't pay the bill for his trash pickup, so in order to raise the necessary funds he must turn his evil lair into a luxury resort.

35.title: Mister Eggman
35.plot: When it's revealed that Dr. Eggman isn't actually a doctor, he becomes a laughing stock and must go back to school to finish his Ph.D. in evil.

36.title: The Haunted Lair
36.plot: Thinking his lair is haunted, Eggman sells it to Barker, who turns it into a haunted house attraction. Sonic and Tails set out to prove ghosts aren't real.

37.title: Return of the Buddy Buddy Temple of Doom
37.plot: With the servitude of the Froglodytes and Gogobas, Dr. Eggman searches for a crystal that will power his giant Mech Suit.

38.title: Eggman's Anti Gravity Ray
38.plot: Eggman's anti-gravity ray causes chaos in Hedgehog Village.

39.title: Victory
39.plot: Sonic challenges Eggman to a game of soccer in order to save the Village's beloved rec center.

40.title: Three Men and My Baby!
40.plot: When Tails, Knuckles, and Sonic accidentally injure Lady Walrus they agree to take care of her baby, Chumley.

41.title: Where Have All the Sonics Gone?
41.plot: Morpho sends Sonic to a dimension where he never existed. Sonic must unite his gang and help take back the alternate dimension village.

42.title: If You Build It They Will Race
42.plot: The gang becomes very competitive with one another when they enter an auto race, using cars they've designed themselves.

43.title: Chain Letter
43.plot: Sonic agrees to be Dr. Eggman's friend on social media - a kindness he will surely regret.

44.title: Vector Detector
44.plot: Amy's hammer is missing and she is lost without it. Vector the detective is on the case.

45.title: Three Minutes or Less
45.plot: Sonic becomes a delivery boy for Meh Burger, guaranteeing a delivery in less than three minutes, but Eggman gets involved.

46.title: Lair on Lockdown
46.plot: After accidentally triggering lockdown protocol during a battle, the gang gets trapped in Eggman's lair with Eggman, Cubot and Orbot.

47.title: You and I Bee-come One
47.plot: Tails turn to beebot and sonic must save him.

48.title: Don't Make Me Angry
48.plot: As a result of an experiment gone wrong, Eggman turns into an adorable little creature every time he gets angry.

49.title: Eggman Family Vacation
49.plot: Dr. Eggman and Steve turn a family vacation in Roboken into an opportunity for evil. Mighton and Bolts enlist the help of Sonic and friends.

50.title: Return to Beyond the Valley of the Cubots
50.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

51.title: Eggman: The Video Game: Part 1
51.plot: Eggman wants to change his image to win fame. So he develops his own video game called Stache Smash. But later, Eggman hides spybots everywhere and records the action when Sonic and his friends are fighting Eggman's robots. And later, he recruits Shadow to help him make the video game epic.

52.title: Eggman: The Video Game: Part 2
52.plot: Shadow finds out that Eggman fooled him by making a mash-up video of Sonic saying mean things about him. Meanwhile, Eggman finds out that Shadow is after him, so he hides out in another dimension. But suddenly, Sonic and Shadow find him, and another Eggman is in their dimension. And suddenly, a world collision happens. It's up to Sonic and his friends to find the Eggmans and save the world.

1.title: The Sidekick
1.plot: When Tails gets injured in a battle with Doctor Eggman, Sonic holds auditions for a new sidekick to replace him.

2.title: Can an Evil Genius Crash on Your Couch for a Few Days?
2.plot: When his evil lair is undergoing repairs, Dr. Eggman crashes on Tails' couch and proves to be a very difficult roommate.

3.title: Translate This
3.plot: Tails invents a robotic universal translator. However, it also translates what someone is actually thinking while talking, so it unintentionally reveals the gang's hidden thoughts and embarrasses them - and gives Dr. Robotnik an idea.

4.title: Buster
4.plot: Sticks is acting careless towards animals, so the gang convinces her to train her sensitivity by getting a pet. The one she chooses - a cute filthy hyperactive goo-regurgitating small robotic dog - is not what they had in mind.

5.title: My Fair Sticksy
5.plot: After being invited to a fancy gala, Sticks admits she does not know how to behave in a lady-like manner.

6.title: Fortress of Squalitude
6.plot: When Dr. Eggman discovers that "Modern Lair Magazine" wants to do a spread on his evil lair, he enlists Amy's help in sprucing up the place.

7.title: Double Doomsday
7.plot: Dr. Eggman hires an intern who turns out to be a bit unstable. He commandeers Eggman's doomsday device and is going to set it off. Not to be outdone, Eggman begins building a competing doomsday device. Sonic and Tails step in to avoid disaster.

8.title: Eggheads
8.plot: Eggman bakes up some "evil cookies" which turn Sonic's friends into Eggman's henchmen.

9.title: Guilt Tripping
9.plot: Sonic and Tails save a town and are guilt-tripped into staying.

10.title: Dude, Where's My Eggman?
10.plot: Dr. Eggman is missing and Orbot and Cubot can't remember what happened.

11.title: Cowbot
11.plot: When Tails reprograms one of Dr. Eggman's robots, it becomes a killing machine set on destroying Eggman.

12.title: Circus of Plunders
12.plot: In hopes of having new additions to his circus, a ringmaster captures Sonic the Hedgehog, Tails, Sticks, Amy Rose and Knuckles the Echidna.

13.title: Unlucky Knuckles
13.plot: Knuckles feels that the only reason Sonic always bests him is that Sonic has better luck. So, Knuckles tries to run out his bad luck and reset the luck balance of the universe by constantly putting himself in harm's way.

14.title: The Meteor
14.plot: A meteor causes Sonic and Eggman to exchange bodies.

15.title: Aim Low
15.plot: After losing his confidence, Dr. Eggman gets help from a motivational speaker, and then becomes too reliant on the life coach.

16.title: How to Succeed in Evil Without Really Trying
16.plot: When Tails' berry-picking machine ruins an orchard, a group of evil scientists believe Tails is one of them.

17.title: Don't Judge Me
17.plot: After being injured in a battle against Sonic, Eggman decides to take Sonic to court to receive justice.

18.title: Dr. Eggman's Tomato Sauce
18.plot: When Dr. Eggman markets his own brand of tomato sauce, the others are suspicious of possible ulterior motives.

19.title: Sole Power
19.plot: Sonic must give up his speed when it causes a deafening tone, but Dr. Eggman may have a remedy.

20.title: Hedgehog Day
20.plot: After an explosion at his evil lair sends him into a time loop, Eggman relives the same day over and over. He must convince Sonic and the gang to help him fix this time anomaly.

21.title: Sleeping Giant
21.plot: Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles accidentally awaken up a sleeping rock giant who begins rampaging.

22.title: The Curse of the Buddy-Buddy Temple
22.plot: Sonic and Eggman get trapped in an ancient temple where teamwork and friendship is required in order to escape.

23.title: Let's Play Musical Friends
23.plot: Orbot and Cubot must defeat a living computer virus in the cyber world.

24.title: Late Fees
24.plot: Sonic must return Amy's book to the library before it closes or Amy will have to pay late fees.

25.title: Into the Wilderness
25.plot: When Sticks insists on being the one to teach Amy survival skills, Sonic and Knuckles challenge them to a race through the jungle.

26.title: Eggman Unplugged
26.plot: After Sonic and the others use Eggman's technology against him, he swears off technology for good; Lightning Bolt Society unleashes an attack.

27.title: Chez Amy
27.plot: After a bad experience at Meh Burger, Amy decides to open her own restaurant, starting a rivalry with her former hang out and Dave the Intern. But when Amy starts to loose the fast food war, she gains an unlikely partner in Eggman.

28.title: Blue with Envy
28.plot: A cool new shrew arrives in town, threatening Sonic's status as the town's biggest hero.

29.title: The Curse of the Cross-Eyed Moose
29.plot: After seeing a cross-eyed moose, Sticks is convinced that she and her friends are cursed. They set out to find a mystical marmoset who is the only one who can remove the curse.

30.title: Chili Dog Day Afternoon
30.plot: When a cooking contest begins, Sonic and friends decide to find out which Chilidog is the tastiest, and strongest. Meanwhile, Knuckles comes across a horde of talking chili peppers, and decides to use them to help out in the contest.

31.title: Closed Door Policy
31.plot: When Amy realizes that Sticks is a pack rat, she forces her friend to have a garage sale to get rid of all the junk that's accumulated in her burrow. During the sale, a secret locked door to an underground world is removed and an invading horde is set free.

32.title: Mayor Knuckles
32.plot: Knuckles decides to replace the Mayor of the Village while he goes fishing, but he begins to accept too many laws, causing the village to end up having fights.

33.title: Eggman the Auteur
33.plot: Eggman starts to film a movie about him and Sonic's rivalry. When Sonic disagrees to help, he gets Dave the Intern to play as Sonic. Sonic and Knuckles decide to help so Dave can continue his job at Meh Burger.

34.title: Just a Guy
34.plot: After Sonic calls Mike "a normal guy", the village begins to become upset at him. Amy tells Sonic to join her club so he can control his thoughts properly.

35.title: Two Good to Be True
35.plot: In an alternate dimension where Knuckles is the smart leader of the team, a freak accident causes him to end up in the normal dimension, and everyone begins to like him better that the original. But when they find out that two Knuckles in the same dimension will cause the dimensions to explode, Sonic and Tails decides to try to send the alternate Knuckles back home.

36.title: Beyond the Valley of Cubots
36.plot: After Cubot meets prototypes of himself, rejected by Eggman, he stays with them, and Sonic and Tails agree to protect the prototypes from Eggman.

37.title: Next Top Villain
37.plot: Dave the Intern inadvertently captures Dr. Eggman and hijacks his robots, finally achieving villainy.

38.title: New Year's Retribution
38.plot: While the rest of the village is celebrating New Year's Eve, Eggman decides to slow down time in order to complete his previous year's resolution of defeating Sonic just once before year's end.

39.title: Battle of the Boy Bands
39.plot: The guys go undercover as a boy band to prove that Amy and Sticks are being brainwashed by a pop icon.

40.title: Tails' Crush
40.plot: Tails is experiencing a crush; Dr. Eggman has a difficult time picking up his package from the post office.

41.title: Bro Down Showdown
41.plot: Sonic and Knuckles enter a best friend game show to win a new couch for Amy, but the show pairs Sonic up with Dr. Eggman.

42.title: Late Night Wars
42.plot: Comedy Chimp gets fired and Knuckles, gaining popularity after being featured in a newspaper, is brought in to replace him.

43.title: Fire in a Crowded Workshop
43.plot: A fire burns down Tails' workshop.

44.title: It Wasn't Me, It Was the One-Armed Hedge
44.plot: Eggman's particle accelerator goes missing and all evidence points to Sonic, so Sonic sets out to find what really happened.

45.title: Robot Battle Royale
45.plot: After being convinced that he is a real inventor, Knuckles challenges Tails in a robot competition hosted by the mayor, not knowing anything about mechanics.

46.title: No Robots Allowed
46.plot: Dr. Eggman is in trouble with his homeowners' association and will stop at nothing to defeat them, even if it means hosting a fancy dinner.

47.title: Fuzzy Puppy Buddies
47.plot: Amy and Dr. Eggman become fuzzy puppy buddies.

48.title: Designated Heroes
48.plot: The gang accepts a dare from Eggman to fight him not as a group but one at a time. Eggman gains the advantage when he's able to use each of their weaknesses against them.

49.title: Role Models
49.plot: The village is sick of Sonic and his friends' bad judgement. So the mayor hires a platypus role model instructor to teach them how to be good role models.

50.title: Cabin Fever
50.plot: When their time at the beach is ruined by a storm, Sonic, Tails, Amy, Knuckles, and Sticks all have a slumber party at Amy's house. But suddenly, things go a little bit out of shape.

51.title: Counter Productive
51.plot: Knuckles tries to make amends for a past misdeed, but he only succeeds at making things worse.

52.title: It Takes a Village to Defeat a Hedgehog
52.plot: Dr. Eggman joins forces with all the supervillains of Bygone Island to defeat Sonic the Hedgehog, while Shadow the Hedgehog pursues the same goal on his own.

imdb.plot outline: Sonic and his friends Tails, Knuckles, Amy and Sticks live in and around a Village. This vast landscape is filled with jungles, mountains, undersea civilizations, cloud cities and all kinds of other environments.
imdb.title: Sonic Boom
plot: Sonic and his friends Tails, Knuckles, Amy and Sticks live in and around a Village. This vast landscape is filled with jungles, mountains, undersea civilizations, cloud cities and all kinds of other environments.

23 years after the original Sonic The Hedgehog Video Game, fast, handsome, and arrogant hero Sonic The Hedgehog continues to fight his arch nemesis, Dr. Eggman. Along with Tails, Knuckles, Amy, and a new recruit named Sticks. But that is not all, Sonic and his friends also explore new places such as cloud cities, going underwater, and more.
